name: ArGe (Terrible-Entertainment)
description:
Story

An ancient fantasy world is dominated by conflict. Human, Orc, Elf and Undead are at war with each other. Generals lead their armies to destroy all enemies.

Technical Details

This is a fully functional proof of concept built using Unreal Engine 4. 

Installation

Download the archive and extract it. Then go to the resulting directory and run ArGe.exe
Missing runtime libraries will be installed automatically with your permission.

Minimum System Requirements
  • CPU: Intel 3rd Gen or equivalent
  • Video Card: GeForce 600 series or equivalent
  • Disk Space: 1GB

Don't expect much :)
